actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to further define sponsors of public employment programs under that Act.

summary.text: Makes all Indian tribes, bands and groups eligible sponsers of public employment programs under the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to further define sponsors of public employment programs under that Act.
